title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 103.3 - Field inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 103.3 - Field inspection

State Regulations

At least three field inspections shall be made during the
pollinating period, said inspections to be made without previous notification
to the grower. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
103.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
